com.j256.ormlite.logger
Class LoggerFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.j256.ormlite.logger.LoggerFactory

public class LoggerFactory
extends Object

Factory that creates Logger instances. It uses reflection to see what loggers are installed on the system and tries to find the most appropriate one.

To set the logger to a particular type, set the system property ("com.j256.ormlite.logger.type") contained in LOG_TYPE_SYSTEM_PROPERTY to be one of the values in LogType enum.

          Type of internal logs supported.
